meanings.definition: A small marine fish of the cod family, found in North Atlantic waters.
meanings.sent1: I saw a tommycod swimming in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often catch tommycod for their size.
meanings.sent3: The tommycod decided to throw a party in the sea.
meanings.sent4: The school of tommycod moved gracefully through the water.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the tommycod caught my eye.

meanings.definition: A tommycod fish or its flesh, used as bait for fishing.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman used a tommycod as bait for his hook.
meanings.sent2: Tommycod is a popular choice for bait among anglers.
meanings.sent3: The clever tommycod pretended to be a lure for the other fish.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the tommycod attracted a variety of fish.
meanings.sent5: The wiggling tommycod enticed the big fish to bite.

meanings.definition: A tommycod fish or its flesh, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using tommycod.
meanings.sent2: Tommycod is a tasty treat enjoyed by many.
meanings.sent3: The tommycod cooked up a storm in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The flavor of the tommycod dish was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown tommycod fillet looked appetizing on the plate.
